name: Cradije, Fate's Dungeon
description:
Cradije, Fate's Dungeon is a Dungeon Crawling board game in which all you need is a deck of tarot cards.  Become one of 22 classes and tackle the dungeon with up to 6 players, in order to gain the treasure hidden within.

This file contains the rulebook for the game.  All you need after that is a tarot deck and then you're ready to play!
